General.Name: Transtouch Technology
General.Description: Transtouch Technology Inc. produces and sells touch panels in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers film and glass projected capacitive touch panel; and TP bonding with LCM. Its products are used in HMI and multifunction printers; POS and ATMs; military and aviation; automotive industry; medical and marine applications; and gaming devices. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 50, Hwa-ya 3rd Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333
